entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
